English: Yang Yuhuan `楊玉環~|杨`玉~环[Yang2 Yu4 huan2] or Yang Guifei (719-756), famous Tang beauty, consort of Emperor Xuanzhong `唐玄宗~[Tang2 Xuan2 zong1], blamed for extravagance and killed as a scapegoat during the An-Shi Rebellion `安史之亂~|`安~`史~`之~乱[An1 Shi3 zhi1 Luan4]

Yang Yuhuan `楊玉環~|杨`玉~环[Yang2 Yu4 huan2] or Yang Guifei (719-756), famous Tang beauty, consort of Emperor Xuanzhong `唐玄宗~[Tang2 Xuan2 zong1], blamed for extravagance and killed as a scapegoat during the An-Shi Rebellion `安史之亂~|`安~`史~`之~乱[An1 Shi3 zhi1 Luan4]
